edu.ncsu.csc216.androtech.model.repair_center

Class RepairCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.androtech.model.repair_center.RepairCenter

  • public class RepairCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing an array list of tech droids that will be used to repair the various devices.
    Version:
    1.0 (March 19, 2015)
    Author:
    Adams Ombonga (amombong)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RepairCenter()
      Constructor method used to create repair center (ArrayList) used for housing the various tech droids

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTechDroid()
      Method use to add a tech droid to the repair center array list, if there are already 30 droids in the repair center then no new droids is added
      TechDroid getDroidAt(int index)
      Returns the droid at the specific index.
      int numberOfAvailableDroids()
      Method used to determine how many droids are available for servicing different types of devices.
      java.lang.String printDroids()
      Method used to print the list of droids available in the repair center
      Device release(int index)
      Method used to release a device from a tech droid after it has been repaired, the released device is what is returned
      int totalNumberOfDroids()
      Method used to return the total number of droids in the repair center array list

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • RepairCenter

        public RepairCenter()
        Constructor method used to create repair center (ArrayList) used for housing the various tech droids

    • Method Detail

      • addTechDroid

        public void addTechDroid()
        Method use to add a tech droid to the repair center array list, if there are already 30 droids in the repair center then no new droids is added

      • numberOfAvailableDroids

        public int numberOfAvailableDroids()
        Method used to determine how many droids are available for servicing different types of devices.
        Returns:
        number of available droids

      • getDroidAt

        public TechDroid getDroidAt(int index)
        Returns the droid at the specific index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index for the specified droid
        Returns:
        the droid at the specified index

      • totalNumberOfDroids

        public int totalNumberOfDroids()
        Method used to return the total number of droids in the repair center array list
        Returns:
        total number of droids (size)

      • release

        public Device release(int index)
        Method used to release a device from a tech droid after it has been repaired, the released device is what is returned
        Parameters:
        index - index of the droid which has the device to be released
        Returns:
        the released device

      • printDroids

        public java.lang.String printDroids()
        Method used to print the list of droids available in the repair center
        Returns:
        String representing all the droids in the repair center
